launch-e2e.command: nx run bounce-loader:start & cd packages/bounce-loader && yarn playwright test --ui

launch-e2e2.command: yarn concurrently -k "wait-on tcp:4200 && cd packages/bounce-loader && yarn cypress open --e2e --browser chrome" "nx run bounce-loader:start"

e2e2.command: yarn concurrently --kill-others --kill-signal SIGKILL --success first "yarn wait-on tcp:4200 && cd packages/bounce-loader && yarn cypress run --record --config --e2e" "nx run bounce-loader:start"

test.command: cd packages/bounce-loader && yarn vitest run --changed --config vite.config.ts
